Вхід Реєстрація

Graphic design + Web design

Course duration: 2.5 months.

Bonus session on employment strategy.

Time: Weekday evenings and/or Saturdays

2 times a week for 2.5 hours.

There is a monthly payment option, check with managers for details.

  • "Graphic design + Web design"
  • Introduction to design. Basic concepts, history of development and modern trends in graphics.
  • Color science. Color theory, contrast, nuance, accent, analog colors, warm and cool tones. Color models: CMYK, RGB, PANTONE
  • Typography. History of origin, types of fonts and their combination
  • Composition. Golden ratio, Fibonacci series, rule of thirds, lack of composition, rhythm and proportions. Modular grids and their applications.
  • Adobe Photoshop. Detailed study of the interface, tools, the principle of operation of layers. Working with layers, bitmap, text, shape, color, effects and filters.
  • Adobe Illustrator. Study of the interface, basic tools, principle of operation. Creation of the logo and corporate style of the future brand from a pencil sketch in the project graphics to a full-scale project
  • Corel Draw. Program interface, tools, basics of work, development of printed material, preparation of layout for printing
